codeSystems.name: ImmunizationAllCvxValueSet
codeSystems.title: Immunization / All / CVX
codeSystems.description: Contains all CVX codes from <https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/vaccines.asp?rpt=cvx> as of 2023-09-20.

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationAllIcd11ValueSet
codeSystems.title: Immunization / All / ICD-11
codeSystems.description:
Contains ICD-11 MMS codes from the [`2023-01` release](
https://icd.who.int/icdapi/docs2/SupportedClassifications/) that are descendants of the Foundation element `164949870` ("Vaccines") according to the [ICD API](https://icd.who.int/icdapi). Generated on 2023-06-23.

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationAllSnomedValueSet
codeSystems.title: Immunization / All / SNOMED CT
codeSystems.description: Contains descendants of SNOMED CT concept `787859002` "Vaccine product (medicinal product)". Note that codes from _any_ SNOMED CT extension are valid as long as they descend from this concept.

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationCovidAllValueSet
codeSystems.title: Immunization / COVID / All codes
codeSystems.description: A list of all immunization codes for COVID, combining the following ValueSets: ValueSet-immunization-covid-cvx.json; ValueSet-immunization-covid-snomed.json; ValueSet-immunization-covid-icd11.json

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationCovidCvxValueSet
codeSystems.title: Immunization / COVID / CVX
codeSystems.description: Contains [CVX ("vaccine administered") codes](https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/vaccines.asp?rpt=cvx) with recommended consumer-suitable display text for use in SMART Health Cards, with localized consumer friendly terms

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationCovidIcd11ValueSet
codeSystems.title: Immunization / COVID / ICD-11
codeSystems.description: Contains ICD-11 MMS codes from the [`2023-01` release](https://icd.who.int/icdapi/docs2/SupportedClassifications/) that are descendants of `XM68M6` ("COVID-19 Vaccines").

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationCovidSnomedValueSet
codeSystems.title: Immunization / COVID / SNOMED CT
codeSystems.description: Contains SNOMED CT codes that identify specific COVID-19 vaccines for use in SMART Health Cards.

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationOrthopoxvirusAllValueSet
codeSystems.title: Immunization / orthopoxvirus / All codes
codeSystems.description: A list of all immunization codes for orthopoxvirus, combining the following ValueSets: ValueSet-immunization-orthopoxvirus-cvx.json

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationOrthopoxvirusCvxValueSet
codeSystems.title: Immunization / orthopoxvirus / CVX
codeSystems.description: Contains [CVX ("vaccine administered") codes](https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/vaccines.asp?rpt=cvx) with recommended consumer-suitable displays for use in SMART Health Cards, with localized consumer friendly terms

codeSystems.name: LabQualitativeResultValueSet
codeSystems.title: Qualitative infectious disease-related lab test result codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes a codes to identify the results of qualitative lab tests related to infectious diseases.

codeSystems.name: LabQualitativeTestCovidValueSet
codeSystems.title: LOINCs identifying qualitative COVID lab tests
codeSystems.description: This value set includes a subset of the LOINCs found at <https://loinc.org/sars-cov-2-and-covid-19/> that identify COVID-19-related laboratory tests. Only those laboratory tests that include qualitative results we believe to be useful in SMART Health Cards are included.
